org.springframework.boot.actuate.neo4j

Class Neo4jHealthIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.AbstractHealthIndicator
      • org.springframework.boot.actuate.neo4j.Neo4jHealthIndicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HealthIndicator

    public class Neo4jHealthIndicator
extends AbstractHealthIndicator
    HealthIndicator that tests the status of a Neo4j by executing a Cypher statement.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Eric Spiegelberg, Stephane Nicoll
